wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General John George Walters Clark CB, MC and bar (2 May 1892 – 16 May 1948) was a senior British Army officer who fought in both World War I and World War II. During the latter he commanded the 10th Armoured Division, formerly the 1st Cavalry Division.

response: *Lieutenant (temporary Captain) John George Walters Clark, Lancers.
